roleset.name: Showing off

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: My felony I committed was mostly due to my showboating my ability to sell a straight face.
example.arg: my ability to sell a straight face

example.name: arg2
example.text: They believe his showboating to the crowd, which was missed by the television cameras, led to another Old Firm game turning into madness.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, relation to show.03. No VNcls.
